articles.title: Fast Fusion scratches the hyper fast F-Zero itch
articles.description: The Switch 2 technically launched with an F-Zero game, as F-Zero GX was available on Nintendo Switch Online's premium tier as part of the GameCube lineup. But if you're looking for a new F-Zero or Wipeout, the console has a spiritual successor that costs just $14.99: Shin'en's Fast Fusion. Fast Fusion pits you in futuristic […]

articles.description: The agreement will pave the way for developing up to 1 gigawatt of next-generation, AI-ready data centre capacity in Madhya Pradesh, using Submer’s advanced cooling technologies The post MP Govt Signs Deal with Submer to Build Eco-Friendly AI Data Centres appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

articles.title: Advanced fine-tuning methods on Amazon SageMaker AI
articles.description: When fine-tuning ML models on AWS, you can choose the right tool for your specific needs. AWS provides a comprehensive suite of tools for data scientists, ML engineers, and business users to achieve their ML goals. AWS has built solutions to support various levels of ML sophistication, from simple SageMaker training jobs for FM fine-tuning to the power of SageMaker HyperPod for cutting-edge research. We invite you to explore these options, starting with what suits your current needs, and evolve...

articles.title: Evaluating generative AI models with Amazon Nova LLM-as-a-Judge on Amazon SageMaker AI
articles.description: Evaluating the performance of large language models (LLMs) goes beyond statistical metrics like perplexity or bilingual evaluation understudy (BLEU) scores. For most real-world generative AI scenarios, it’s crucial to understand whether a model is producing better outputs than a baseline or an earlier iteration. This is especially important for applications such as summarization, content generation, […]

articles.title: How PayU built a secure enterprise AI assistant using Amazon Bedrock
articles.description: PayU offers a full-stack digital financial services system that serves the financial needs of merchants, banks, and consumers through technology. In this post, we explain how we equipped the PayU team with an enterprise AI solution and democratized AI access using Amazon Bedrock, without compromising on data residency requirements.
articles.author: Deepesh Dhapola
articles.content: PayU offers a full-stack digital financial services system that serves the financial needs of merchants, banks, and consumers through technology. In this post, we explain how we equipped the PayU team with an enterprise AI solution and democratized AI access using Amazon Bedrock, without compromising on data residency requirements.
